author: Netflix Anime
description:
Led by the enthusiastic Dorothy, Lili tours Saint Thomas Art Academy. What kind of twists and turns await her on her artistic journey?

Love Through a Prism premieres on Netflix on January 15!
https://www.netflix.com/LoveThroughaPrism

Subscribe: https://bit.ly/33okaL0
